intro: Riedelia macrothyrsa, commonly known as the large-throated riedelia, is a member of the Campanulaceae family. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant features showy, bell-shaped flowers that are often blue or violet in color. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a rough texture. Riedelia macrothyrsa is characterized by its robust stems and clusters of small, clustered flowers.
